about_the_game:
Earth has been seized by aliens! You are the pilot of the last Knight - a gigantic combat robot. Explore the ruins of civilization, battle giant monsters, travel through time, and prevent humanity's defeat!


The world changes based on your actions.

Exploring locations, you'll notice that it changes based on your actions, whether it's victory in battle or the death of your hero. With each new playthrough, you can find something new for yourself until you uncover all the secrets!


Tactics and skill.

Use the tactical combat system and your reaction to deal as much damage as possible to your enemies. Install various modules on your combat robot. Use different types of weapons to search the ruins. Obtain rare trophies from unique opponents.


Accumulate your combat power.

In the ruins of cities and in the remains of your enemies, many resources are hidden that will help you become stronger. Wisely allocate resources to win.


Not an easy choice.

On the path to saving humanity, you will make difficult decisions. Sacrifices and heroic deeds are the path of a true knight!
